Parameters: int: the time from start to first fix in milliseconds.
onFirstFix(int).Description: Called when the GNSS system has received its first fix since starting.

Parameters: GnssStatus: the current status of all satellites.
onSatelliteStatusChanged(android.locatio.Description: Called periodically to report GNSS satellite status.

onStopped().Description: Called when GNSS system has stopped.

onStarted().Description: Called when GNSS system has started.

ClassDesc: Used for receiving notifications when GNSS events happen.
